base.without: the value of {{key}} must exist without {{value}}
base.invalid: the value of {{key}} is not allowed to be {{value}}

validate.allowOnly: the value of {{key}} must be one of {{value}}

array.base: the value of {{key}} must be an Array
array.includes: the values(s) {{value}} in array {{key}} must be of the following type(s) {{validTypes}}
array.excludes: the values supplied to array {{key}} must contain {{validTypes}}

number.base: the value of {{key}} must be a number
number.min: the value of {{key}} must be larger than (or equal to) {{value}}
number.max: the value of {{key}} must be less than (or equal to) {{value}}
number.float: the value of {{key}} must be a float or double
number.int: the value of {{key}} must be an integer

boolean.base: the value of {{key}} must be a boolean

function.base: the value of {{key}} must be a Function
